message.body: Hmm someone just posted a 2002 Subaru impreza rs 2.5 that is ONlY $4000 and has as many miles as my car now (117,000) clean title and new timing belt and new tires and wheels but claims no problem w it so far
It is pretty cute looking
I realize that it might break down like mine did but
In Delaware so close
That's not bad
Yeah... That's ok. You'd have some left over
Not a bad car.
Not too many miles on it either
Subarus run for ever
Yeah it is not bad AT ALL
I saw tons w that amt of miles
Attempting to be sold for a lot more
Like I realize it could break down
But also...$4000 in cash for real?
It is the same risk I took w mine
Except on a 4,000 dollar car
Not a 7,000
True
And I do think it is cute and maybe I'll get lucky and run it into the ground who know
*knows
Man buying a used car is so stressful
oMG I'm going to go drive to her now. She Posted it 22 hrs ago and when I called she said she had a ton of calls already and someone was seeing it at 9am tomorrow- she sounded not shady at all
She also said her husband was a mechanic and I could come out to their home to meet them Tonight and I'm Doing it
Like 4ooo cash is ridic. It is 2 hours away tho and you have to come w me I'm sorry
She sounds soooomnice too
Omg to tonight is a horrible night
Then our wifi went down bc of Alec's bf and then my phone fell of the bed face first and the whole screen just cracked just like yours
Tonight has been horrible
This is after a whole evening of calling people and every single person being like ooooh just sold sorry
Or oooooh I'm w someone now and they are buying it sorry
Agh I'm sorry
Your phone broke : (
What a terrible night. Cheer me up when you come home later on lol
On your way home...if you pass a wawa could you get cookies lol
Or a pastry lolol Ill accept 711 tastykake
Oh shoot... Just saw this. I'll head home soon
Oh no rush! Just whenever you do
If you pass food
(Just to warn you though, I tried taking apart the bed and couldn't, so you will have to take it apart or maybe we will sleep in the basement w the
I wasn't strong enough. :(
Omg too funny, I can switch out the seats pretty easily it seems like, you know, so I can have orange leather bucket seats in my 2002 $4000 car LOL￼￼
eBay is full of hilarious parts for the 2,5rs and the wrx
Like glow in the dark purple wheels LOLOL which I obv must have
Wow you dONt get your tax back
The sales tax is gone so this whole horrible experience still cost me like 400 dollars
I'm never buying from a dealership again. It was an awful experience and they lied to me and strung me along and bullied me
And the warranty would have been bullshit had you not been my bf
Bc I wouldn't have insisted on bringing the car back again and again had you not told me to
So basically a 3 month warranty is worthless if you know nothing about cars- like I know nothing about them
Bc they can keep returning the car without doing much and hoping you don't notice
Like yeah you can get totally fucked from buying from a person, but you can be fucked either way basically unless you have an extended warranty which isn't even worth it on cheaper cars
